FedEx in Eindhoven is op zoek naar flexibele parttimers voor de lange termijn  Ben jij iemand die graag actief werk verricht  Lees dan snel verder   Wat ga je doen  Je neemt papierwerk uit handen en bent de eerste schakel in het proces Als parttime administratief medewerker bij FedEx in Eindhoven  ofwel data keying agent  ga je actief aan de slag  Wanneer de koeriers terug komen van hun route neem jij al het papierwerk van ze over  Je bent hierin de eerste schakel van het proces  Je controleert het papierwerk en vervolgens ga je deze sorteren en archiveren  Dit doe je uiteraard niet alleen  want je werkt samen met een heel team  Daarom zijn we op zoek naar een echte teamplayer  Je werkt flexibel met een starttijd tussen 14 00   16 00 tot 20 00  s avonds Als parttime administratief medewerker bij FedEx in Eindhoven werk je van 16 00   20 00  In het weekend wordt niet gewerkt  dus dan ben vrij

Tiqets is one of the fastest growing tech scale ups in the Netherlands  To keep it moving fast and making culture more accessible  we re hiring a Data Analyst to join us   Full time   Amsterdam Who are we   We re revolutionising the way people buy tickets to culture and attractions in cities all over the world  Our technology allows users to easily browse and book tickets to the best attractions in seconds  meaning customers can enter museums  zoos  theme parks and more simply by showing their smartphones  About time  right  We re dedicated to bringing simplicity to the world of travel and entertainment  If you want to join our team  working as a Data Analyst  send us your CV  We might be looking for YOU   Our values Be accessible  Help out  communicate honestly  and be there for each other  Be remarkable  Have fun  think creatively  and celebrate great moments together  Skip the line  Be fast  flexible  and smart  take responsibility and push forward  Life at Tiqets What you will do The Data Team is responsible for supporting the data needs of a large number of teams at Tiqets by helping them become more data driven in the way they operate  As a Data Analyst on the Data team  you will have the opportunity to work on a variety of interesting problems related to User Journey Analysis  A B Testing  Reporting  Marketing Campaign Optimization and much more   You will work closely together with Product Owners  Developers  Marketeers and Merchandising Specialists to uncover insights about the business  build new hypotheses and help Tiqets improve through an iterative process of testing and learning   If you are passionate about Data  enjoy working on challenging business problems in a fast moving environment and believe in the importance of teamwork then this could be the right opening for you   Responsibilities Dive deep into large business datasets to uncover valuable insights that can be turned into actionable hypotheses Build dashboards  reports and visualizations to allow others at the company to be able to ask the right data questions Work with Product Owners  Developers  Marketeers and Merchandising Specialists to determine and measure the right metrics in their respective domains Keep a close eye on the ever changing data challenges at Tiqets  and collaborate closely with Data Engineers  Data Scientists and other Data Analysts on the team to solve them Educate and empower others at the company to be more self reliant for their data needs Qualifications Technical or mathematical education at a Bachelor or Master level  3 5 years of experience in Data Analyst roles Strong SQL skills  Experience working with a modern Data Warehouse like Redshift  Snowflake or BigQuery Experience building reports on BI tools like Looker  Tableau or Qlikview  Experience with Web Analytics tools like Google Analytics  Mixpanel  Amplitude  etc  Excellent oral and written communication skills  Ability to clearly explain concepts and actionable insights Capacity to thrive in a startup scale up environment  adapt quickly  work independently and take ownership of your work Nice to have  prior experience in e commerce with a background in hypothesis driven A B Testing Nice to have  experience with data modelling tools  such as dbt  Fluent in English Living in the Netherlands EU Perks   Benefits at Tiqets Young  energetic  international work environment Bright  welcoming office located in the centre of Amsterdam Competitive salary and paid holiday leave Tiqets  learning academy  skill lab  group   individual learning Annual company getaway to undisclosed location Sports activities  free gym  running sessions  boot camp  football  climbing and moreFun  sociable company events in and out of the office Friday drinksSummer party 20  employee discount code to explore great museums venues worldwide Pension contribution and travel compensation  Everyone   employed at Tiqets will receive a monthly internet allowance for working from home  Everyone   employed at Tiqets can reimburse home work space necessities Our Data Analytics Stack SQL Looker Redshift DBT Airflow Python  Follow us on Instagram Meet the Team

We re Creative Fabrica  a fast scaling tech start up from Amsterdam   Our mission is to change the way people consume digital assets   About the platform  We launched in 2016 as a marketplace for fonts with a subscription service  In the last 6 years we have been through tremendous growth  and we re just getting started   We have scaled to 30 million  monthly page views  viewing over 4 million listed products from 10000  active designers   Our focus is to create a platform for designers that enables them to offer exceptional high quality content  We make their products searchable in unique ways  This allows our customers to speed up their workflow  allowing them to focus on what they love most  Creating   How will you help us   The Head of Data Science   Analytics is the driving force behind the company s data quality  data analytics  data science and experimentation strategy and execution  In this role you will be responsible for attracting and retaining high caliber data analysts and data scientists focused on innovation and rapid iteration  You will report to the VP of Product   You and your team will be owning the data systems for collecting  storing and analyzing data  We are entering a phase of exponential growth and need to scale the tools  data lakes and pipelines to enable data driven product development and decision making at Creative Fabrica   You  along with your team  will dig into the data to uncover insights  identify opportunities for product improvements and new product development  define product metrics with goals  enable experiments and drive customer experience  engagement  and adoption of Creative Fabrica products  As you are building your team we also need you to be hands on and deliver on data needs   Responsibilities  Foster data driven culture of innovation  iteration  and ownership throughout all of Creative Fabrica Recruit  manage and lead a team of world class data analysts and data scientists to support our aggressive growth and deliver key data products and capabilities Be the subject matter expert for driving the product instrumentation  including web tracking tools like Google Analytics and Amplitude  and product data strategy Drive data consistency and quality within a common framework and taxonomy to drive continued improvements to data driven insights across the business Own both the long term technical data strategy and the day to day operations  including fostering innovation and implementing best practices Collaborate with cross functional teams to research  build   improve data analyses to identify opportunities for product improvements  new product features  product utilization and improve customer experience  engagement  and retention Lead the creation of new data driven approaches for the purpose of generating business insights through data analytics  information visualization  and addressing unanswered business issues in a proactive manner Leverage the momentum of the business to create career defining growth opportunities for your team Facilitate Creative Fabrica s development ensuring that data enables continued growth  including marketplace dynamics technologies Design data governance and security protocols Represent the data analytics and data science disciplines throughout the organization  You will have a powerful voice in the company and represent data analytics across different parts of the business  Attract and retain a diverse  high caliber  output oriented team Profile   Essential  Bachelor s degree  or higher  in Data Science  Mathematics  Computer Science  Physics or equivalent  8  years of experience leading and building out a Data Analytics   Data Science team Strong background on Data Engineering and Web tracking tooling  Experience building powerful yet easy to use and adopt data systems and tools supporting high volume and reliable interactive modeling  analysis  and experimentation Proven track record of strong stakeholder management  interacting with senior company leadership on complex issues  Required  Good verbal and written English communication skills Ability to lead and coach while creating a high performance culture  Let us take care of you  Competitive Compensation  We believe that hard work  skills and ambition should be fairly compensated  Flexibility  30 remote days per year  Need a change of scene  Take your laptop  pack a bag and work from the woods  your parents  place or the beach  The best tools and stylish kit  Laptop  Check  Collaboration tools  Check  Killer accessories  Check  Awesome Office  Based in a beautiful office in the centre  working here means delicious lunches in the garden  Friday beers at our local  and access to our own CF library  TGIF  Work Life balance is important   we work hard together  and we have fun together  On Fridays we turn on the speakers  and start celebrating the weekend  Is this you   Get in touch  We d love to speak to you   You can apply by clicking the  Apply now  button   Creative Fabrica is an equal opportunity employer  We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees

job_title: Director of Data Centres and Networks
job_desc: Director of Data Centres and Network  Our Company  Established in 1996 in Amsterdam  Booking com has grown from a small Dutch start up to the third largest ecommerce company in the world  Booking com is the largest business within Booking Holdings  NASDAQ  BKNG  and accounts for the vast majority of Booking Holdings  total revenue  Booking Holdings is a leading Fortune 500 e commerce conglomerate with a market cap of approximately  100 billion   With a mission to make it easier for everyone to experience the world  Booking com invests in digital technology that helps take the friction out of travel  Booking com connects travelers with the world s largest selection of incredible places to stay  including everything from apartments  vacation homes  and family run B Bs to 5 star luxury resorts and even tree houses  The Booking com website and mobile apps are available in over 43 languages and customers can reach Booking com 24 7 for assistance and support in over 43 languages  As Booking com envisions a future in which it will serve customers a one stop solution for all travel related needs  we are working towards offering a fully  Connected Trip   in which every aspect of the travel experience can be planned and booked through us  We are determined to build the number 1 travel brand in the world   At Booking com  the decisions we make are a reflection of our Values   they reflect what is important to us  both as individuals and as an organization  When they are shared  they build unity in a group  They build culture  Think customer first  We obsess about adding value for our customers   guests  partners  colleagues   to make it easier for everyone to experience the world  Own it  We deliver on our promises  make informed decisions and prioritize to get the important things done today  Learn forever  We are resilient  take time to reflect  and seek to learn   from colleagues  from the outside world and from our failures  Succeed together  We celebrate team success  through making connections  building trust and valuing the diverse perspectives of others  Do the right thing  We get the right results the right way  For each other  our communities and the world around us   Booking com Leadership Team Chief Executive Officer  Glenn Fogel SVP  Chief Finance Officer  interim   Sue D Emic SVP  Chief Marketing Officer  Arjan Dijk SVP  Chief Legal Officer  Maria Barros SVP  Chief People Officer  Paulo Pisano SVP  Trips  Bryan Batista SVP  Accommodations  James Waters SVP  Chief Technology Officer  Rob Francis SVP  Fintech  Daniel Marovitz Profile Director of Data Centres and Networks  This role is responsible for the strategy to create and deliver data centers and networking instructure which is the foundation of Booking s private cloud and application software  The role is responsible for designing  building  and operating a highly reliable  cost efficient stack spanning multiple facilities and vendors around the globe  partnering with finance and procurement for financial forecasting and vendor negotiations  and collaborating private cloud software colleagues to match the hardware and network design elements to the architectural direction of the company   Responsibilities  Create and execute the strategy for evolving and operating Booking com services across physical data centers and public cloud platforms  Gather requirements  manage expectations  and deliver best of class platforms to booking com internal customers  Oversee the operational requirements to run world class platform services at high SLA  Manage incidents and service quality  drive down toil through process and automation  and track results against our year on year goals  Identify strategic partners and manage their delivery against cost  functionality  and SLA commitments  Accountable for creating budgets aligned to business growth and technical needs of our internal stakeholders  manage to those budgets in conjunction with our finance partners  Benchmark our platform infrastructure against industry standards and competitors for cost  innovation  and operational excellence  Partner with our technical infrastructure teams around the world  meet their unique needs  and integrate end to end with Booking com s global infrastructure  B offered  This position is open to candidates worldwide and when hired we provide Visa and Relocation assistance  Technology is the core of our business and we ensure that we give the best  deal  possible  to our employees  Here is what you get  Living and working in Amsterdam  one of the most cosmopolitan cities in Europe Contributing to a high scale  complex  world renowned product and seeing real time impact of your work Working in a fast paced and performance driven culture Career Advancement via Online and On the job training  Hackathons  Conferences and active community participation Competitive compensation and benefits package and some great added perks of working in the home city of Booking com

The Impact  You are a natural team player  you partner up with our clients for solid data reporting  You have some experience with Data Analytics  Data Modelling   Data Visualization but you re eager to learn more and add a fresh perspective to our team  You team up naturally with like minded Data Geeks of 5CA  Who you are  You are confident with numbers  you know how to analyze complex processes  and you do not give up until you completely understand a problem  You can work under pressure  and you live and breathe data  In fact  when you gaze at the Stars  you can identify Facts and are able to enter other Dimensions  You report directly to the Senior Data Analyst of our Data Team  Your biggest passion is using data to create insights that help improve our business and drive innovation throughout the company  As an innovator  your English is impeccable and your communication skills top notch  allowing you to operate comfortably and connect easily with everyone in our organization   Responsibilities Fetch and thoroughly analyze operational and client data Develop and encourage the adoption of PowerBI reporting Support the data automation process and encourage innovation in 5CA s data information structure Support and work closely with other Data Analysts and Senior Data Analysts in the team Proactively provide root cause analysis and improvements analysis based on data to various Operations Stakeholders Partnering up with clients and taking ownership of end to end reporting for them  Bachelor s degree  preferably in the field of Economics  Business  Informatics  Econometrics  Computer Science or similar Prior experience of 2 years in the field of data analytics  data analysis and statistical modeling Business acumen  you understand a growing company s needs Your energy As an Energy Data Expert at System Operations  you work with multidisciplinary teams to create the electrical grid of the future  The energy transition presents Alliander with an enormous challenge  The increase in decentralised generation  increasing electricity consumption  the introduction of heat grids and new gases in a single integrated energy system  alongside the creation of the infrastructure and market facilitation to realise these energy flows  necessitate a fundamentally different approach to our processes and services  The team at System Operations works hard to deliver solutions that allow us to make smarter and more efficient use of our electrical grids for our customers  And that s where you come in  because you re the team s technical expert  Your daily work involves transforming innovative ideas for our customers into concrete solutions and processes  One example is a new grid structure that allows us to prevent and resolve congestion in the electrical grid  As an expert at System Operations  you are capable of thinking outside the box  You continuously develop new  technologically innovative solutions  Your environment You and your fellow experts are the technical core and the beating heart of a Scrum team that brings together expertise about energy technology  As a team  you have the space and autonomy to determine your own course as you design and realise the electrical grid of the future  while coordinating as necessary with your environment  In concrete terms  your work involves developing concepts and carrying out grid calculations to realise customer connections without making major capital investments  This is how you contribute to an affordable  reliable and stable electrical grid for today and tomorrow  You are part of one or more multidisciplinary teams that  assess and estimate the impact of customer applications  new customer propositions and technological innovations on our grids and systems  determine the conditions to allow new solutions to be implemented  implement  or arrange the implementation of  technological innovations and modifications within and beyond System Operations in consultation with stakeholders  At the front end  you ensure effective coordination with our end users and supply chain partners  You work with your fellow experts specialists  Scrum masters and product owners  You prepare and maintain user stories and prioritise these based on the backlog  Your employer We are Alliander  a group made up of various companies  including Liander  Qirion and Kenter  We develop and maintain the electrical grid for millions of users in the Netherlands  That s quite a challenge  especially as the energy transition is now in full swing  Thankfully  we can count on the knowledge and skills of our 7 000 professionals  Together  we devise and realise technically smart solutions to prepare our electrical grid for the future  We also try to minimise our carbon emissions while doing business sustainably  In this role  you will join the 7 000 employees of Liander  the grid operator  Together  they manage the daily distribution of gas and electricity through our grids  You share your expertise within the System Operations department  On the work floor  you ll find 15 multidisciplinary teams of 7 10 people who are young at heart and ambitious  Although the teams work hard  there s still time for a joke and a friendly pat on the shoulder  Thanks to the intensive teamwork  they are also very close  System Operations works in an Agile way to deliver the energy supply of the future  One example is the spike app  which allows us to predict and resolve spikes in our grid load  This helps us prevent our electrical grids from becoming overloaded and ensures a reliable energy supply for our customers  System Operations is thus an essential part of Liander and is always looking for new innovations that improve our service  Your working conditions You have the energy  we give you the space   the space to get the best out of yourself  Because that benefits everyone  you  Alliander and most of all our customers  And there s more  In this role  you can expect  based on a 38 hour working week   A good salary  depending on your training and experience  junior max  gross monthly salary  4 530  scale 8   mid level max  gross monthly salary  5 127  scale 9  gross monthly salary  senior max  gross monthly salary  6 001  scale 10   A permanent contract after one year  A Personal Budget of 18  of your annual salary on a full time basis  You can choose to have this paid out  to purchase extra leave days or to pay it into your pension  An allowance of 70  of the statutory minimum wage for parental leave hours  This applies if you take parental leave after one year of service  36 hours  4 5 days  extra saved leave each year  You can use this leave or save it for up to 10 years for a sabbatical etc  A long term employability budget of  500  You can use this for career development  a gym membership and or ergonomic home office furniture etc  A pension with ABP  Alliander pays 70  of your pension premium  A fixed year end bonus of 5 94   Alliander offers you plenty of space and opportunities for development  We work with the best trainers in the Netherlands  You can choose from a wide range of training courses  workshops  study programmes  study books  webinars and e learning modules  An NS Business Card or a mileage allowance if you travel by car  A gross contribution of  360 and discounts on supplementary insurance if you have a collective health insurance policy with Zilveren Kruis Achmea  A laptop and mobile phone  or Bring Your Own Device  You ll be surprised by the excellent working conditions at Alliander  We have listed these for you at https   werkenbij alliander com arbeidsvoorwaarden Your background Your energy means you excel as an expert  Your motivation  skills and broad perspective help you take the team to the next level  You actively seek out collaboration  both within and beyond System Operations  You are a hard worker who can operate effectively at the strategic  tactical and operational level  and you don t give up easily  You re not afraid to try new things  At System Operations  we believe in  learning by doing   This also means you have a huge amount of freedom to work autonomously as a team  This role offers you the opportunity to develop and grow into the role of senior expert or Product Owner  In your work  Energy Technology and IT come together  What we ask of you  At least a completed Higher Vocational Education  HBO  or university degree in electrical engineering  energy technology  control engineering  physics or mechanical engineering and experience with IT or A completed Higher Vocational Education  HBO  or university degree in IT Data Science and experience with electrical engineering  energy technology or physics Experience with low voltage  medium voltage or high voltage grid structures or security concepts  load flow calculations  short circuit calculations or selectivity calculations would be an advantage  That you are an innovative thinker with strong analytical skills and problem solving competences who can bridge the gap between energy technology and IT solutions  That you are flexible and focused on innovation  you are motivated to include your colleagues in new applications  including in non technical areas   Please note  you must be resident in the Netherlands  If you do not live in the Netherlands  we will not be able to process your application  Your action We have space for your energy  If you would like more information about this vacancy  please contact Peter Wessels  System Development Chapter Lead Hoe maak jij onze klanten blij  Hoewel we gaan voor klant partner matches made in heaven  lukt dat niet altijd in één keer  Retourzendingen zijn  en blijven  dus onderdeel van de e commerce realiteit  maar de manier waarop we retouren afhandelen kan altijd beter  Wil jij bijdragen aan de meest duurzame en soepele afwikkeling van de diverse retourstromen   Waarom werken met retouren gaaf is Retourstromen lijken eenvoudig beheersbaar  maar bij bol com is dat een complexe flow  Bijvoorbeeld omdat retouren 33 miljoen shapes   sizes hebben  Bovendien worden veel artikelen verkocht door zakelijke partners  maar gepicked  gepackt en verstuurd door bol com zelf  Deze dienst  Logistiek via bol com  verzorgt ook de retourafhandeling  Van eigen assortiment en steeds vaker van onze partners  Het team Return Solutions zorgt voor een optimaal retourenproces in ons eigen retourenwarehouse en heeft als doel dat we zoveel mogelijk producten terug op voorraad kunnen leggen  of als dat niet lukt er maximale waarde uit te halen en het artikel een  tweede leven  te geven  Een interessant speelveld in het hart van bol com  waarin je met veel verschillende afdelingen binnen en buiten Logistiek het verschil kunt maken   De grootste uitdaging Bol com heeft de afgelopen jaren de transitie gemaakt van  traditionele  online winkel naar toonaangevend retail tech platform  Daarbij zijn retouren in absolute zin flink toegenomen  wat heeft bijgedragen aan het besluit om een specialistisch retourenwarehouse te bouwen  Komende periode worden de laatste delen van dit nieuwe retourencentrum opgeleverd  Hier liggen dus nog genoeg kansen voor doorontwikkeling  Daarnaast liggen er nog kansen in de aansluiting op de verschillende goederenstromen na retourverwerking  De ambitie  een extreem soepel end to end retourverwerkingsproces  waarbij we zoveel mogelijk automatiseren  de keuzes optimaal met software en of mechanisatie ondersteunen en een optimale balans vinden tussen waardebehoud van de retourstroom en de kosten die we maken   Wat je doet als Data Analist Return Solutions Als Data Analist Return Solutions ben je expert op het gebied van data gedreven denken en werken  Jij ontsluit tijdige  relevante en betrouwbare data voor je team maar ook voor andere stakeholders van het retour domein  Je verricht analyses  bewerkt  verrijkt en modelleert  ruwe  data en ontwikkelt de juiste dashboards en rapportages  Dashboards en rapportages dus die collega s in staat stellen om goed onderbouwde beslissingen te nemen   Je maakt impactvolle dashboards waarbij je kijkt naar de hele flow in het retourencentrum Je ontwikkelt technische skills voor data analyse  denk aan SQL  Tableau  Excel  etc   Je helpt collega s bij complexe analyses en modelleringen  waarbij jij vaak net die creatieve route kunt plotten die collega s ontgaat Je analyseert processen en haalt het net op bij stakeholders  zitten er afwijkende vissen tussen  En wat kunnen we daar aan doen  Je vertaalt inzichten naar requirements  business cases en concrete acties Waarom jij het verschil kunt maken Omdat jij twee gaven combineert  talent voor het opdoen van de juiste inzichten en het vermogen om je team daarin mee te nemen  Data modelleren richting meetbare output en impact is je passie  Verder verwachten we dat je een zelfstarter bent  iemand die graag op zoek gaat naar de grootste kansen en daar werk van maakt  Daar slaag je in op basis van een mix van inhoudelijke kennis  analytische vaardigheden  samenwerkingsbereidheid en de oprechte drive om anderen met jouw inzichten te verrassen en verder te helpen  We zijn op zoek naar een data analist die niet schrikt van grote en complexe bakken met data en staat te trappelen om zijn haar analyses hierop los te laten   3 redenen waarom dit  n iets voor jou is Laat zien waarom niet Laat zien waarom wel  Het hele pakket Nee  als je heel goed bent in analyses  maar de interpretatie graag elders belegt  Meer dan data thuis bent in Tableau en of BigQuery   You own it  you love it Ja  als je het leuk vindt om vanaf dag één  eigenaar  van jouw data modellen te zijn   Een beter milieu  Ja  als je in het kader van Full time   Amsterdam Hi  we are Mollie        Our mission is creating a greater playing field for everyone  By offering convenient  safe and worldwide payment solutions we remove barriers for companies of all sizes to compete on equal terms  Your opportunity  As Mollie s VP of Data you are responsible for evolving our data platform  tools  and mindset  This is an exceptional leadership opportunity where you will lead in defining our vision and strategy for data  covering topics like the technologies that power our data lakes  analytics  machine learning  while curating the quality and governance of our data  The role reports directly to Mollie s CTO and plays a key part in shaping Mollie s technology strategy and roadmap   You manage and grow the teams that build and improve our data platform  that in turn powers the business  This platform enables the different departments and product engineering teams throughout the business to unleash the power of data for decision making  by building capabilities such as AB testing   and create opportunities to use data to build products  Our usual customers are small and medium sized businesses  and we see a lot of opportunity to improve our product and processes through the use of data   In addition to managing the teams that build the data platform  you work with people across the business to educate  explore opportunities to use data in a way that advances Mollie s ambitions   What you ll be doing Own the topic of data at Mollie by clearly defining what success looks like  set ambitious goals and make sure you drive progress against those   Setting the long term vision and strategy for Mollie s data domain  You ll be the driving force behind the development and success of this key area  Bring our data platform to the next level  enabling easy access to machine learning for product teams  and better tools for the business  Inspire and lead a team of data scientists  data engineers and analysts  create processes and structures that drive career progression and collaboration  Scale and grow your teams with an eye on diverse skills that cover machine learning  analytics and engineering  and other skills needed to achieve the objectives  Foster and maintain Mollie s inclusive culture that is both collaborative and passionate  where creativity and engagement are highly valued  You are a trusted advisor and thought leader to the executive leadership team  Ensure each organisation gets the analytical support they need and contribute to the company strategy through high level insights and communications  You will own the development  engagement and performance of our data visualisation stack  Right now we are using Looker but we are always looking for ways to improve  Meet the data team Isabelle  Head of Data Edward Lead Analyst Ana  Data Scientist Engineer Willem  Data Science Lead

As a Data Scientist  you are able to understand specific questions from our customers and answer them with data driven analyses  In this role  you are responsible for gathering the right information  formulating working hypotheses and testing these in order to solve problems step by step  In addition  you are able to communicate the analysical steps  outcomes and impact in a clear way to both team members and  external  stakeholders  Similarly  you will be responsible for implementing and possibly automating these steps and their integration into our clients  data systems   Responsibilities Understanding and solving challenging business issues using data in a variety of customer segments  Implementing and integrating solutions and applications in various system landscapes  Maintaining contacts with stakeholders and informing them adequately and transparently about outcomes  progress or setbacks  Training and coaching business consultants and junior team members  Building and maintaining a relevant network at existing and new customers  Valcon core values Can do Together Curiosity Integrity Joy We offer An energetic  ambitious and international environment with a great working atmosphere  An environment with significant autonomy and responsibility  A steep learning curve and structured coaching from your own mentor  A thriving community  active in both business and social events  Market relevant employment package  salary  benefits fund  bonus  lease car or mobility allowance and laptop   Apply today  Experience A completed technical university degree or PhD  Minimum of 2 years work experience as a Data Scientist  or as a Business Consultant with experience in data related issues Strong team player with good communication skills  Curious and self critical with strong analytical skills  Experience with analysis and programming of business issues and solutions  in e g  Python  R  C C    SQL   You are fluent in Dutch and English Location The Netherlands

Job description Would you like to work on shaping tomorrow s world  Contribute to groundbreaking innovations and developments in technological knowledge  Are you a team player who feels at home in an international and interdisciplinary environment  Then we are looking for you  Eindhoven University of Technology  TU e  is an internationally oriented research university  specializing in engineering  science   technology and is known for its large scientific impact and its role in developing technological innovations  TU e is a university at the center of society and sets its focus on complex social challenges by concentrating its education and research on three Strategic Areas  Energy  Health and Smart Mobility  An ambitious university requires dedicated support to our scientists  the support service Data Management   Library  DML  plays a key role at TU e within the fields of Research Data Management  RDM   General Data Management and Open Science  Furthermore  DML comprises the University library and archives  and provides information skills training to bachelor  master and PhD students  The DML staff totals 50 employees  Job description We are looking for a research data management specialist  data steward  with an enterprising and customer oriented attitude  who will shape RDM support to the university s researchers  You will support researchers in addressing internal and external requirements with regards to RDM  applying FAIR principles to research data  and so contribute to reuse and reproducibility of research  Your work will cover a broad scope of topics  which vary from assistance in RDM planning  advice on storage  archiving and publication of research data  handling privacy sensitive data  policy making  to providing and developing training in RDM skills  You will serve as first line of support for privacy related matters  working closely with the Privacy team and performing the first assessment of the privacy compliance in research projects  Besides  you will contribute to the further development of data stewardship within TU e  You report to the Head of Research Data Management and closely cooperate with colleague data stewards  DML   colleagues from Information   Management Services  IMS  and other services  You will Support and advise researchers on RDM related issues such as for example  Preparing and implementing Data Management Plans  DMP   Drafting data paragraphs for grant proposals  Storing  publishing and archiving research data  Preparing their submissions for Ethical Review Board approval  Handling privacy sensitive data in compliance with legal requirements and institutionalpolicies and guidelines Applying FAIR priniciples to research data  Fullfilling financial and legal requirements concerning research data  Support and advise researchers on privacy related issues such as for example  Drafting informed consent and privacy notices  Evaluating privacy roles within research collaborations and consortia and identifying the needed agreements and documents  Identifying and assessing privacy and legal risks  including copyright and licensing  during the entire research lifecycle  Preparing Data Protection Impact Assessments  DPIA  in collaboration with the Privacy team  Contribute to the development of data stewardship and RDM services at TU e  Raise awareness on RDM and handling privacy senstive data among researchers  Develop and provide trainings on RDM and privacy GDPR compliance  Establish a functional and appropriate services supply chain for researchers in coordination with colleagues  Job requirements You are expected to have the following qualifications and characteristics  An academic level of work and thinking  preferably a completed Master or PhD in the technical or medical sciences  and an affinity with research practice  Proactive and result oriented attitude and gain energy from pioneering and collaborating within a relatively new field of work in support of scientific research  Ability to easily assimilate knowledge and not afraid to learn on the job  Skilled in transferring and sharing knowledge to staff  students  junior researchers and senior researchers  Ability to connect and translate various requirements  i e   legal  policy and technical  into solutions and best practices with regards to research data management and data stewardship  Customer oriented and supportive way of working  gain energy from supporting and solving issues for others  Networking skills and feel comfortable with connecting people and building networks  Excellent communication and negotiating skills and can be authoritative when the situation requires it  You are have excellent English language skills  both orally and in writing  Proficiency in the Dutch language is not a requirement  but it is an advantage  Preferably you have  Experience in handling privacy sensitive data and knowledge of GDPR  and or willingness to develop yourself further in this field  Experience or a demonstrable affinity with research data management and data stewardship within higher education or a research institution  Knowledge which will contribute to applying FAIR principles to research data  e g  on metadata  standards   Conditions of employment You will be appointed for a one year period  Appointment via Euflex  the TU e secondment organization  will be considered  If performance is good  this appointment may be made permanent  Full time gross salary  depending on research experience  competences and educational background  will be a minimum of   2 968   and a maximum of   5 211    salary scale 9 11 CAO NU and UFO profile Specialist Scientific Information 2   The year end allowance is 8 3  of the annual salary  corresponding to a monthly salary   The holiday allowance is 8  of the annual salary  In addition  TU e offers excellent secondary conditions of employment  e g   a minimum of 41 days of leave based on a 40 hour working week and excellent sports facilities  flexible working hours  an excellent pension scheme via the ABP    Information and application For information please contact  Marijella van der Klugt    31 40 2476345 Linde Keverkamp    31 40 2476303

productie en verdere bedrijfsvoering   Verantwoordelijkheden Je gaat op zoek naar betekenisvolle patronen en correlaties in datasets Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het ontwikkelen van datamodellen Je About us  Beat is one of the most exciting companies to ever come out of the ride hailing space  One city at a time  all across the globe we make transportation affordable  convenient  and safe for everyone  We also help hundreds of thousands of people earn extra income as drivers   Today we are the fastest growing ride hailing service in Latin America  But serving millions of rides every day pales in comparison to what lies ahead  Our plans for expansion are limitless  Our stellar engineering team operates across a number of European capitals where  right now  some of the world s most ambitious and talented engineers are changing how cities will move in the future   Beat is currently available in Greece  Peru  Chile  Colombia  Mexico and Argentina   About the role  We re accepting these challenges by applying data  algorithms and machine learning to problems in logistics  routes  personalization  search  pricing  experimentation and more  Our Data team is at the heart of this effort and is an essential ingredient in Beat s aggressive growth plan and vision for the future   As a Data Analyst in Pricing  you will take on some of our biggest marketplace challenges such as optimising dynamic pricing models  discovering opportunities for new product features  understanding price elasticity  or evaluating the impact of product changes on our passengers and drivers  Your work will impact the entire marketplace  so you ll have the opportunity to make an immediate difference  Your day to day will involve close collaboration with stakeholders across product  operations  machine learning  data engineering  and technology   What you ll do day in day out  Contribute to solving challenging two sided marketplace problems using data solutions  Understand user behavior with regards to pricing and help shape our pricing strategy  Own end to end data analysis including business interpretations and formulation of next steps  Design and implement frameworks to measure price elasticity of passengers at scale  Evaluate price changes in a controlled manner  either via offline or online experiments  Work together with the product and analytics teams to identify and deliver high impact product improvements and optimizations  Keep yourself updated with advances in the fields related to ride hailing and micro mobility  Work closely with other data members of the team  build a strong data driven culture in the domain and ensure that we have the right knowledge and tools to solve problems  What you need to have  Educational background in quantitative discipline or equivalent experience  At least 3 years of hands on experience in analytics in a fast paced environment  Knowledge of SQL  Python R  and data visualisation tools such as Tableau  Exemplary communication skills  ability to work with cross functional teams  including technical and non technical team members  Strong commercial awareness  ability to clarify ambiguity and balance priorities  Interest in experimentation  designing experiments  and using causal inference methods to draw conclusions  Deep belief in data and ability to rally people behind your findings recommendations  Nice to have  Experience with pricing analytics  What s in it for you  Competitive full time salary Private Health Coverage on the Company s group program  Breakfast  high quality daily lunch on a very low cost  fruit and snacks all day long Flexible working hours  top Line tools  Spanish Lessons Working in a hyper growth environment  you will enjoy numerous learning and career development opportunities A great opportunity to grow and work with the most amazing people in the industry  Being part of an environment that offers challenging goals  autonomy and mentoring  which creates incredible opportunities  both for you and the company  As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce  Beat is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race  color  national origin  ethnicity  gender  disability  sexual orientation  gender identity  or religion

Over RedForce  RedForce is een betrouwbare naam voor Linked Data in de Oracle Cloud  Zowel voor advies als projecten kan de klant bij ons terecht  Daarnaast hebben wij in eigen beheer ons softwareproduct Lidia ontwikkeld  Onze klanten zien de strategische voordelen van een moderne IT ondersteuning  En RedForce helpt ze bij het realiseren van die moderne IT  Ook als dit de transformatie naar een ander business model en het aanpassen van business processen betekent  Voor onze klanten is time to market steeds belangrijker  Wij bieden daarom kant en klare Cloud oplossingen gericht op specifieke klantgroepen   En we zetten ze zo op dat later aanpassen eenvoudig is  De door ons gebruikte omgevingen voldoen voor zaken als schaalbaarheid  beschikbaarheid en security aan de hoogste eisen   RedForce creëert op unieke wijze oplossingen voor onze klanten door gegevens uit diverse silo s te combineren  administratieve gegevens met geografische gegevens  IoT sensordata  gegevens uit documenten en gegevens van ketenpartners of de overheid  Dat doen we realtime en zonder replicatie  Daarmee leveren we onze klanten sneller en goedkoper een oplossing  We gebruiken voor de integratie Linked Data  RDF   Oracle Spatial and Graph en een eigen oplossing genaamd LIDIA  Dit is een GIS applicatie volledig gebaseerd op Linked Data  waarmee je Geo objecten kunt capturen en muteren  Daarnaast kun je Geo gegevens in een paar klikken koppelen aan allerlei typen andere data  financieel  onderhoud  documenten enz  De gecombineerde gegevens gebruiken we in te configureren applicaties en in portalen  We bieden onze klanten hiermee geïntegreerde maatwerk GUI s zoals geïntegreerde klantbeelden en smartphones tablet apps voor medewerkers in het veld   De Linked Data tester  We zoeken ervaren testers voor de opdrachten van Redforce bij klanten  Je werkt mee aan de realisatie van toekomstvaste oplossingen voor uitdagende problemen  gebruik makend van de nieuwste technologie van Oracle en uit de open source wereld  Als Linked Data tester heb je ervaring met SPARQL en GeoSPARQL  Zoals je ziet gebruiken wij veel verschillende methoden en technologieën  er is bij ons dus veel te leren  En omdat wij steeds met de nieuwste technologieën bezig blijven ben je bij ons nooit uitgeleerd  Heel belangrijk is daarom dat je leergierig bent  houd van pionieren en je altijd het beste van jezelf wilt geven  Wij zijn bereid het beste van onszelf aan jou te geven  in opleiding  in uitdagende projecten en in samenwerking met ervaren collega s   Ben je geïnteresseerd  maar heb je nog inhoudelijke vragen  bel dan naar Peter van Bentum  telefoon 06 10273666  Voor overige vragen Stefan van der Mark  telefoon 06 41678002  Of solliciteer direct  stuur dan je CV en motivatie naar stefan vandermark dpa nl

Your new job and office Location  preferably at our Head office in Zaandam  Since expertise is boundaryless  we are also open to other locations We are looking for a HR Data Analyst for Ahold Delhaize who can dramatically increase our insight into how our associates experience HR  We are looking for someone who can help give our HR community the insights to make data driven decisions across our organization  You have a strong technical background in data visualization and analytics  You will design and create operational tactical metrics and dashboards that will assist in making decision in our HR domain You will be partnering across teams to ensure that our HR metrics are consistent and aligned to our strategic goals  You will be responsible for digging into the details to improve data quality  show new insights and drive new recommendations that will impact decision making  You will be working together with the HR Analytics Lead in a newly established team that will continue to grow The job itself We are looking for someone with at least 2 4 years of HRIS or Reporting support as well as 2 years of demonstrated experience with data visualization  We need you to be able to work magic with HR data  You MUST be passionate about and have experience with Data and Reporting  and have a passion to learn and master new data analysis techniques and data science methodology  We d love to see experience with SuccessFactors  PowerBI  R  Python and other Data tools  Develop a clear understanding of the data required to drive insight for those business problems and to deliver the required data  Create insight for the appropriate area of expertise  by analyzing and presenting global data and reports  In the process you identify errors and advise on solutions  Your reporting skills should be top notch as you will do the majority of the reporting for the Global HR department  Don t know HR specific analytics  Don t sweat it  the HR Analytics lead does and can train you on things like turnover  span of control  FTE  productivity unlock  annualized rates  etc  It would be super helpful if you have worked in SuccessFactors  but again  the HR Analytics Lead can train you in that as well  You use quantitative analysis and the clear presentation of data to see beyond the numbers and drive understanding and insight into the levers in our business  Help stakeholders to become data minded by creating and delivering specialized presentations and training on HR data related topics across the business  Drive design  development and deployment of standardized metrics and dashboards to measure our delivery across all our accounts  Deliver dashboards and custom reports to support specific decisions  identifying opportunities to automate where possible  Ensure business needs are being met by evaluating the ongoing effectiveness of current data   analytics initiatives  Build global HR KPI s based on the annual report  Dow Jones Sustainability Index and other global reports together with the HR Strategy and Change manager  Implement People Analytics module within SuccessFactors together with your local stakeholders  Perform data quality checks and establish a data quality process and structure  Maintain current dashboards and provide access management to stakeholders Your new office As an HR Data Analyst  you will work at and across Ahold Delhaize where approximately 410 000 employees worldwide serve over 50 million customers a week  Locally  you ll be working with 1 500 colleagues in Zaandam  the Netherlands  Although we are working mainly from home given the current situation  We improve and innovate every day  supporting our trusted local brands and reinforcing our role as a leader in retail and e commerce  Everything you do with your colleagues is directly visible in our internal departments What do we offer Covid 19 Our main priority continues to be the health and safety of our employees and customers  Due to the Covid 19 pandemic  this position will be remote until further notice  We will continue monitor the circumstances and when we feel comfortable  this position will return to our bustling Headquarters in Zaandam  where you will have the opportunity to collaborate face to face with a talented and diverse group of colleagues  At Ahold Delhaize we want to grow  That is only possible if you grow with us  That is why you can go in all directions with us career wise and in your personal development  While we work together to build our brand and your career  you can count on  based on 40 hours a week   What do we offer  An inspiring position in an international work environment  where you will work with different HR teams as well as IT  A very dynamic and challenging job with various internal and external stakeholders and several HR process owners  Possibilities to develop yourself both professionally and personally  Plenty of holidays  45 days to be exactly  25 5 regular paid vacation days and 19 5 ADV days  Enjoy  You develop as rapidly as the tech around us  Thanks to feedback loops with the best   the brightest tech savvy colleagues  A powerful laptop and smartphone are  included   You also get discounts on insurance and groceries  up to  300   a year   You have an opportunity to provide everyone with a healthier  tastier and more sustainable diet  RequirementsWe ask At our Ahold Delhaize Global Support Office  we are looking for an experienced HR Data Analyst  And specifically  for this vacancy  you are skilled at providing clear insights within a demanding international environment  bring strong interpersonal communication skills  and are able to drive issue resolution and results leveraging a detail oriented and simplicity mindset  The recipe for maximum impact  Bachelor s Degree in Statistics  we would also be excited to see people with Degrees in Data Management  Business Information Systems or other relevant fields of study around Data  Math Statistics  minimum of 1 4 years total experience in HRIS or IT focused on applications  minimum of 1 years  experience in data visualization  experience  knowledge and expertise in business systems analysis and design and project life cycle methodology  incl  best practices  An attractive pension plan of which we pay out over 4x times the amount you contribute to the fund  So you ll continue to enjoy a comfortable income even after retiring     In addition to knowledge  you have the following key competences to be successful in this role  The ability to work cross functionally and cross boarder in international context and setting  Strong communication and data presentation skills  experience analyzing data and communicating the results to senior business leaders  Continuously able to use your process improvement skillset as well as change Management Analysis skills  The ability to document processes  functional specifications and decisions made  as well as the ability to troubleshoot  More job_desc: Mendix is a low code app development platform  First  what is low code  Low code is a visual approach to software development that enables you to abstract and automate every step of the application lifecycle  Gartner predicts that  by 2024  low code application development will be responsible for more than 65  of application development activity   Mendix is repeatedly ranked a Leader in analyst reports from Gartner and Forrester  In the 2021 Gartner  Magic Quadrant for Multiexperience Development Platforms  Mendix placed at the very top of the Leaders quadrant   Mendix  the global leader in enterprise low code  was created to promote collaboration between Business   IT teams  Thousands of forward thinking companies around the world like Ford Auto  Rabobank Netherlands  Zurich Insurance  and Red Bull  can unleash their best ideas faster with the help of the Mendix Platform   Mendix is a Siemens Business   Siemens is a Top 10 Global Software Company and a leader on Fast Company s Most Innovative Companies in the World  With the acquisition of Mendix in 2018  Siemens Digital Industries Software is driving transformation to enhance the digital enterprise where engineering  manufacturing and electronics meet the future of innovation  Mendix employees have the opportunity to work in a hyper growth environment with the support of Siemens  unbeatable market position and resources  As an intern  you will work mainly on two assignments  1  The development of a data monitoring dashboard to help businesses stay in control of data quality issues  Below are the use cases expected to be initially covered on the monitoring platform   Consistency in prediction scores across the Mendix systems Relationship Integrity between salesforce contacts and accounts Consistency between user profile data Completeness of accounts records across the different Mendix systems Reconciliation of Mendix and Siemens contracts Type of data issues include  Data accuracy  comparing against a set of rules  Data consistency  comparing against a corresponding dataset  Missing Incomplete data or records Data integrity issues  checking that data meets certain business rules   2  Assist in making detail technical data documentation of data from source to destination  This includes all data moving from the different source systems  in transit  and to the data lake   Marketing data flowing from source through Marketo and Salesforce to the data lake  Salesforce data moving to Zuora and to the data lake Zuora data moving to SAP and to the data lake Other duties include  Maintaining overview of ongoing data issues  tracking and documenting progress Support the Data Quality Manager on a tactical and operational level  Requirements  Recent graduate in computer science or a related field in IT  Bachelor s degree would be ideal Relational database proficiency experience Data modelling  Technical writing experience Computer programming experience Experience with SQL is a must  R and or Python experience is beneficial  Microsoft Power BI experience   preferred Mendix Rapid Application Development experience   Beneficial Agile development experience  Scrum    Preferred Ability to Speak write English fluently  Dutch speaking is preferable  Ability to work under indirect supervision Flexible in a fast paced dynamic environment with shifting roles and responsibilities Fast and eager to learn new concepts Ability to multi task   work well under pressure Strong computer technical skills Excellent verbal and writing communication skills Working for Mendix and with our Customers means your reliability has to be beyond any doubt  and therefore every employment is subject to a onboarding screening and the condition precedent a Certificate of Conduct is provided that demonstrates you did not commit any offenses that are relevant to the performance of your function   LI PN1

vertaalt de wensen van klanten  leveranciers en directe collega s uit deze landen naar een mooi en duidelijk rapport dat de verwachtingen van de aanvrager overtreft  Hierbij is jouw kennis  ervaring en creativiteit essentieel  De vraagstukken voor de rapportages zijn zeer divers  waardoor je nieuwe kennis en ervaring opdoet over veel verschillende onderwerpen binnen de automotive   Bovendien help je mee om onze Business Intelligence tool OBI verder te ontwikkelen en uit te breiden  Hierdoor heb je ook regelmatig contact met onze IT afdeling  Daarnaast help je collega s met vragen over Excel en of Analytics verder met jouw kennis  Engels schrijven en spreken met onze collega s in de Nordics vormt geen probleem voor jou  In de startperiode geven wij jou op een enthousiaste manier de tijd en aandacht om ingewerkt te worden en kennis te maken met het team   De ene keer ben je bezig met een milieurapportage voor een klant  Vervolgens komt er een verzoek binnen om data te verzamelen voor een mailingbestand  Daarna ga je weer verder met je project om te onderzoeken hoeveel parkeerruimte er benodigd is voor de uitbreiding van onze huurvloot en waar deze het best kan worden gelokaliseerd   De collega s op de afdeling analyse en advies zijn nauwkeurig  nieuwsgierig en kritisch en verwachten dat jij hen hierin kunt aanvullen en versterken   Je takenpakket bestaat o a  uit  Je andere afdelingen in projecten waarbij data benodigd zijn Je ondersteunt en adviseert collega s met vragen over onze BI tool en Excel Je bouwt rapporten en dashboards in onze BI tool  Dit is waarom dit  n iets voor jou is Enthousiasme en kennis is belangrijker dan werkervaring  Je bent goed met Data  Engels spreken vormt geen enkele belemmering voor jou  Je vindt cijfers saai  Je bent niet zo kritisch  Een discussie voeren vind je spannend  Hier kom je terecht Je komt terecht in een afwisselend team dat bestaat uit tien collega s  De werkzaamheden zijn opgedeeld in drie vakgebieden  Client pay  an Employee Benefit Budget  11  of your monthly salary   You decide how to spend this budget  This may include purchasing extra leave days  making extra pension contributions or even receiving extra cash on a monthly basis  a personal budget that you can spend on activities related to your personal development and career  100   reimbursement of commuting costs if you travel by public transport  Do you still prefer to travel by car or motorbike  Then choose a commuting allowance  a pension scheme  to which your contribution is only 3 5   Good to know  Apply via the button  Apply now   Responses will be handled in accordance with our vacancy management policy  Frank Simons  Recruiter  would be happy to answer any questions about the application procedure via Frank simons rabobank nl The application process includes screening  Based on the screening procedures in place at Rabobank  we assess whether new staff are reliable enough to work at Rabobank  Everyone is different  and it is exactly those differences that help us become an even better bank  That s why we want to know who you really are

citizenM is a global lifestyle hotel company involved in the full spectrum of the customer journey  from sourcing a potential reservation  to checking in and staying in the hotel  to the design and development of our hotels  This degree of vertical integration is unique in the industry  This gives us an incredibly rich dataset to collect  transform  and analyze in order to improve the effectiveness of the operating model and therefore guest experience  Much of this data is combined in citizenM s data platform  If data to you is like a bee to honey then we have the honey pot for you purpose As a data analyst on the hotel operations domain you will have the opportunity to work citizenM s rich data sources  You will be preparing dashboards and performing in depth analysis to provide insights in the operational activities around our hotels so that we can smoothen our operations and optimize our guest experience  This role is part of the Business Intelligence Team  where you will be working closely with all functions in the team to transform data into wisdom for different disciplines within citizenM  As part of this role you will collaborate closely with the  hotel  operations team  key responsibilities  leading consumer insight initiatives in an agile way together with all relevant business units  develop dashboards in PowerBI which allow relevant teams to generate insights and track performance around operational hotel initiatives such as food   beverage  housekeeping and guest satisfaction  identify the requests for operational insights and separate the nice to knows from the need to knows  translate these requests into valid research questions  work with big data sets in our data platform to generate the required insights you are able to translate these outcomes into useful insights and to prepare proposals for metrics and solutions  you will apply different data visualization and storytelling techniques in order to convey the message  in this role you should have a curious mind and will analyze data proactively in order to propose areas in need for insights and in order to seize business opportunities  since you will work closely with the core business units you should understand what is happening at citizenM and be able to develop a strong network across several layers within the organization  qualifications   skills a genuine passion for data and the ability to combine analytical data skills with business knowledge  a bachelor  masters preferred  degree  preferably in the field of data analytics  data science or business analytics  proven proficiency in the use of PowerBI  understanding of relational modeling and relational databases  mainly SQL   affinity with a statistical  data science  programming language for advanced analytics  such as R or Python  attention to detail and a creative mindset  ability to succeed in both collaborative and independent work environments  strong communication skills   both written and oral   in order to convey complex analytical results clearly  you re eager to understand and learn about operational processes and the data that is generated through these processes  experience with Agile way of working  locations   hours Voorschoten Support office  Hybrid working is possible  not fully remote  This is a full time position  citizenM is an affordable luxury hotel chain for mobile citizens of the world  With style that will knock your socks off  we offer citizens a real home from home  plus the world s fluffiest pillows  Our typical guest is a frequent traveler who is quality and design driven  and value conscious  We currently have hotels in the Netherlands  France  UK  Switzerland  Denmark  USA and Asia  with more to come soon  We are proud to put hospitality back into the hospitality industry  and have received numerous awards for our groundbreaking approach  We like to do things differently  This means our hotels are not traditional  and neither are our support offices  We re open minded  with kind hearts and global minds  citizenM loves diversity  We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from anyone   AS  LI Hybrid

Master Data Beheerder in Ede  40 uur  Ben je analytisch sterk onderlegd en wil je onderdeel uit maken van een innovatief team bij een groeiende en ambitieuze marktleider binnen de Automotive branche  Dan is de vacature van Master Data Beheerder echt iets voor jou  Wat bieden wij  Een afwisselende baan bij een groeiend  internationaal bedrijf met een sterke marktpositie  Je wordt onderdeel van een hecht team  waar je volop ruimte krijgt om mee te denken en jezelf te ontwikkelen  Een rol spelen in het  inter nationaal overbrengen van kennis en kunde  Specificaties Ede 40 uur HBO werk  en denkniveau Vast Functieomschrijving Je komt te werken op de afdeling Master Data Management  MDM   Deze afdeling is binnen Alliance Automotive Group Benelux verantwoordelijk voor de docking  verwerking  verrijking  interpretatie en het beheer van de product master data  Ook onderhoudt deze afdeling de data voor de diverse online toepassingen  Sinds enige tijd hebben zij hiervoor een State of the art PIM systeem in gebruik genomen  waarmee ze in staat zijn zowel de data als de processen te stroomlijnen en zo de diverse kanalen juist te voeden  Denk hierbij aan portals  webshops en leadgeneratoren  Als Master Data Beheerder zorg jij ervoor dat de  master data altijd up to date is en voldoet aan de verwachting  Je werkt nauw samen met de afdelingen Product Management en E commerce  Je komt terecht in een enthousiast en betrokken team van 5 collega s en je rapporteert direct aan de Master Data Teamleider  Naast het MDM Benelux team zit ook het team dat verantwoordelijk is voor de Europese datastrategie gevestigd in Ede  Vanzelfsprekend wordt er tussen deze afdelingen nauw samengewerkt  Voor uitdagende dataprojecten zit je in deze functie dus  front row   De voornaamste werkzaamheden zijn  Het invoeren  onderhouden  controleren en synchroniseren van master data omtrent artikelgegevens in het PIM en SAP systeem  Het zorgdragen voor correcte brongegevens volgens de laatste actualiteit  Deelnemen aan diverse vernieuwende projecten omtrent technische ontwikkelingen en master data  Onderhouden van het Product Information Management  PIM  systeem  Solliciteer nu  Heeft onze vacature voor Master Data Beheerder je enthousiast gemaakt en voldoe je aan het profiel    Vergeet niet jouw cv en sollicitatiebrief toe te voegen als bijlage  Over Alliance Automotive Group Benelux Alliance Automotive Group Benelux  onderdeel van het beursgenoteerde  NYSE  Genuine Parts Company  is een leidende distributeur van auto onderdelen aan de onafhankelijke aftermarket in Frankrijk  Duitsland  Verenigd Koninkrijk  Portugal  Spanje en Polen  Wie kan tegenwoordig zijn auto dagen missen  Bijna niemand toch  Als jouw auto voor onderhoud of reparatie naar de garage moet wil je dat deze zo snel mogelijk en zonder verrassingen weer voor je klaarstaat  Daarom maakt Alliance Automotive Group Benelux er een sport van om de garagehouder te voorzien van alles wat hiervoor nodig is  van voertuigdata tot de beste prijzen en van technische ondersteuning tot een razendsnelle levering van onderdelen  Het hoofdkantoor en tevens recent nieuw gebouwde  innovatieve Distributie Centrum  21 000 M2 vloer oppervlak  van Alliance Automotive Group Benelux zit in Ede  Meer weten  Bekijk de website van Alliance Automotive Group Benelux en volg ons op social media  Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze advertentie wordt niet op prijs gesteld

Solynta  based in Wageningen  the Netherlands  is a hybrid potato breeding company that  develops hybrid potato varieties with superior traits and performance at a rate much faster  than can be achieved with traditional breeding  The successful application of hybrid breeding  enables the use of Hybrid True Potato Seeds  HTPS   This revolution in breeding not only  allows for much faster product development  but also offers enormous logistical and  phytosanitary advantages  2500 kg of traditional seed tubers are replaced by 25 grams of  seed  Solynta is at the forefront of this innovation and  with its patented technology  platform  is ideally positioned to tap into the multi billion dollar global market for potato  genetics  www solynta com    To expand the research team  we are looking for a Digital Phenotyping Data Analyst   MSc  Full time  For our selections on plants and on tubers we are looking for possibilities to use digital  phenotyping methods for improving the data collection  You are the person that determines  the best way to phenotype different traits  and that calibrates digital phenotyping data with  actual plant measurements  You have experience in image analysis and machine learning   The goal of this position is to develop methods of digital phenotyping to a tool that breeders  can use to make selections KEY ACTIVITIES  RESPOSIBILITIES Image analysis of plants Processing of raw data into interpretable information Correlation of digital phenotyping data to plant traits Automatization of data processing pipelinesWE ASK An MSc in biosystems engineering or similar Image analysis and machine learning skills Experience in digital phenotyping techniques Insight in plant growth characteristics Interest to translate science into a usable product Ability to work closely together with diverse peopleWE OFFER    A one year employment contract with the prospect of permanent employment A competitive salary depending on work experience and education The opportunity to become part of an enthusiastic group of people working on one of the world s most promising innovations for improving food supply   Location  Wageningen  The Netherlands  If you are motivated to strengthen the potato hybrid breeding program at Solynta  we would  like to invite you to send a motivation letter and CV to recruitment solynta com   If you have any questions about the vacancy  please contact Julia Stockem  tel   31   0 6 51894987  This vacancy has no fixed end date

Draag jij graag bij aan het verbeteren van de gezondheidszorg  Ben jij die  ervaren  Data Scientist die wij zoeken met net zo n grote passie voor data als wij  Performation helpt ziekenhuizen dagelijks bij het geven van nuttige inzichten op basis van de beschikbare data  Spreekt jou dit aan  Reageer dan op deze vacature Performation ontwikkelt diverse applicaties die ziekenhuizen ondersteunen op het gebied van capaciteitsmanagement  hoeveel bedden  personeel  OK tijd etc  is nodig en wanneer   Deze verschillende applicaties vormen één netwerk van tools om het ziekenhuis in alle vraagstukken te ondersteunen  Verschillende ontwikkelteams bouwen aan softwaretools  dashboards en koppelingen  Onze tools combineren een krachtige  User Experience   gestandaardiseerd ontsloten historische data en slimme algoritmes om inzichten te geven in het verleden  het nu en de toekomst  Deze tools zorgen voor transparantie in capaciteit en maken van complexe vraagstukken een eenvoudige opgave  Zo kan onze klant zich volledig richten op de patiënt De functieAls data scientist bij Performation ga je op zoek naar verklaringen middels data analyse en ontwikkel je modellen voor capaciteitsvraagstukken in ziekenhuizen  Je werkt nauw samen met het team van developers en de Product Owner  Jij toont leiderschap bij de wiskundige vraagstukken en hebt interesse in het implementeren van de modellen en wiskundige methodieken in de software  Het is belangrijk om de performance binnen de calculaties te blijven monitoren  Je bent bezig om  data analyses en modellen toe te passen die de functionele vraag van de klant beantwoorden  Er is voldoende ruimte om te experimenteren en voor goede ideeën is er altijd een luisterend oor en budget Dit ben jij  Je hebt de ambitie om vraagstukken op te lossen met behulp van wiskunde en data science  Je bent kritisch en hebt oog voor detail  Je neemt je verantwoordelijkheid binnen het team en binnen een project  Daarnaast ben je iemand die de stilte doorbreekt en die ook in tijden van thuiswerken continue de samenwerking met het team opzoekt  Een echte initiatiefnemer  je wacht niet af  Je hebt de passie om nieuwe technologieën te blijven leren en continu jezelf te ontwikkelen Dit vragen wij  Een afgeronde HBO of WO opleiding  toegepaste wiskunde  data science  econometrie of vergelijkbaar  Minimaal 3 jaar revelante werkervaring in een soortgelijke functie Voldoende kennis van Python en enige kennis van PHP is een pre Een passie voor data en data analyse Je hebt een goede beheersing van de Nederlandse taal in woord en geschrift Over PerformationDe zorg is altijd in beweging  Binnen de zorg dalen de budgetten  neemt de complexiteit verder toe en worden de kwaliteitsstandaarden steeds hoger  Degelijke informatievoorziening om de juiste besluitvorming op te baseren is cruciaal geworden  Performation faciliteert zorginstellingen in binnen  en buitenland bij het goed geïnformeerd zijn en op kantoor  een ski trip  vrijdagmiddagborrels en andere gezamenlijke activiteiten Je teamJe komt te werken in een multidisciplinair scrumteam waarin je met onze ervaren datawarehouse ontwikkelaars  front end ontwikkelaars  informatie analisten en testers gaat werken aan verbetering en uitbreiding van het platform  Je werkt in een team waarin diverse vakgebieden samenkomen  Denk aan UX UI
